title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the weekend in sports. Was Steph's Game 4 performance the best ever in front of a Boston crowd? Reggie Miller discusses how this Warriors team would've stacked up against teams from the past.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
